verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: might] claim as much as $ 1.7 billion in penalties from ZTE , China 's second largest telecommunications equipment maker .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] [ARGM-MOD: might] [V: claim] [ARG1: as much as $ 1.7 billion in penalties] [ARG2: from ZTE , China 's second largest telecommunications equipment maker] .
